FuncDef: By default, MLDP resolves the FEC using the unicast RTM. When this command is set tomcast-rtm, MLDP will resolve the FEC using the multicast route table. The multicast route table does not include any IGP shortcuts, unlike the unicast RTM. MLDP cannot resolve a FEC using an IGP shortcut, so if IGP shortcuts are used for unicast, enable multicast MLDP lookups.
